page.title: 12Entertainment in Tiverton
page.content: Entertainment for young people in our area includes Cinema, Arcades, Nightclubs, Discos and in the countryside there are Young Farmers Clubs. We are quite lucky to have a cinema still since most smaller towns do not have one any more. Most films it shows have been on in Exeter for some time before they get here. The Arcades are quite new. Some people said they should not be allowed as they encourage young people to waste time and money. Disco's are held at schools and the Youth Centre as well as at halls in town. Older people have other entertainments especially pubs, bingo, amateur dramatics as well as clubs like the Mid Devon Natural History Society. We don't know so much about these!
